name: @luwio/internationalization
description: Internationalization for all React application powered by Luwio

scripts.build-github: pnpm run prettify && pnpm exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm run prettify && pnpm exec tsup
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm version patch --git-tag-version=false
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm version minor --git-tag-version=false
scripts.release:major: pnpm run build && pnpm version major --git-tag-version=false
